title: Output Schema for Get Root Children Operation
description: Output schema for retrieving the children of the drive root.

name.description: The name of the child item.

size.description: The size of the file item in bytes.

file.description: Indicates that this item is a file.

folder.description: Indicates that this item is a folder.

childCount.description: The number of children in the folder.

value.description: The array of items within the root.

@odata.nextLink.description: URL to retrieve the next set of results, if more items exist.
